name: Radiophobia
description:
Our game is a first person maze horror game - quick recap on our game setting the story goes where you are a paranormal explorer exploring an asylum with your team. However you realize that you are separated from your team. The only thing you have with you is a radio and a flashlight. The goal of the game is to traverse the maze and regroup to your teammates.

Team Member:

  • Tang Wen Jing [Programmer]
  • Brendan Ou [Programmer]
  • Chooi Fei [Designer]
  • Aaron [Programmer]
